price: 7 Comme vous, ils pensaient qu’Allah ne susciterait plus jamais de Messager[1488].
arabic: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا
footnotes: [1488] Ou : ne ressusciterait pas les morts.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum an lan yabʿatha al-lahu aḥadan
